alert.note: Alert for Baca; Bent; Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 9:59PM MDT until June 16 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Baca County in southeastern Colorado... East central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... Southern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 1030 PM MDT. * At 959 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 17 miles south of John Martin Reservoir to 25 miles northwest of Pritchett to 13 miles southeast of Higbee, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Baca, east central Las Animas and southern Bent Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
